channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Aviv Segall

item.title: Digital 3D Smocking Design
item.description: The paper presents a method for digitally previewing a smocking pattern design by formulating smocking as a graph embedding and shape deformation problem.

item.title: Iterative closest conformal maps between planar domains
item.description: The paper introduces an alternating minimization algorithm utilizing the Cauchy-Green complex coordinates to efficiently compute a conformal map between planar domains with initial global alignment.

item.title: Hele-shaw flow simulation with interactive control using complex barycentric coordinates
item.description: The paper explores Hele-Shaw flow, a slow viscous liquid flow between parallel plates, proposing an efficient simulation method using a complex-variable formulation of generalized barycentric coordinates, enabling interactive user control and extending applicability to the exterior domain for simulating two-phase flow and diverse patterns.

item.title: Line accessibility of free form surfaces
item.description: The paper presents an algoirthm for computing the visual hull of a parameteric surface in an arrangement of additional occluding surfaces.
